title: Way to list all guilds a guild member is in?

comments.author: Eearslya.6309
comments.body: https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/API-to-show-what-guilds-I-am-in/first Basically the same thing, just with their API keys instead of yours.

comments.author: Dash.8027
comments.body:
I’m a novice and need help.

Using the new guild API and a guild full of people willing to give me API keys, is there a way to have a single page list each guild that all of my guild members are in using a single click?

Lets say I have 10 people and want to check to make sure my guild is the only guild they’re in; I’d like to be able to have a single page auto-populate with the guild members name and the guilds they’re in, all of the way down my roster.

I don’t need fancy graphics or anything, literally just a list of names and guilds attached to those names.

Please show me the way, API gurus.
